desc: Claudia's Choices Eco Laundry Products & Eco Store has everything you need to get your clothes and laundry fresh & clean. Scent-free, natural, powder laundry detergent, laundry soap & more. Get your clothes clean without the residue.

layout.text:
We are clearing out our remaining inventory with 40% off the listed price.
Please send us an email to purchase items listed on our website. We can accept e-transfer or Paypal.
